column5: Located one block from Lackland Air Force Base, New Valley High Drive Entrance. The house is walking distance to a Super Plus HEB grocery store. There's also a Walgreens & plenty of restaurants nearby. If you like to exercise there's a new GOLDS GYM next to the HEB. It's a great place for a family or a group of friends to relax after a long day exploring the city or visiting family on base. This is a pet friendly home with a large, fenced in back yard. $50 pet deposit.
